bbnews.bbcode: [space=10][c][size=18][b]PRL - New league![/b][/size][/c][space=10][c]PRL is a 2v2 Roper ladder for people[br]who enjoy competitive Ropers[br]at a high skill level.[/c][space=5][c]It is organized by Komito and avirex.[br]The league itself works the same[br]way as TUS leagues.[/c][space=5][c][url=http://www.tus-wa.com/forums/pro-prl/][color=White]Click here[/color][/url] to see how to play PRL![/c][space=5][c]HF GL ;)[/c]

[space=10][c][size=18][b]Great Snooper Updates[/b][/size][/c][space=15][c]If you would like to update[br]your snooper but the auto updater[br]fails then close the snooper,[br]go to the installation directory[br](usually Program Files / Great Snooper)[br]and run Updater2.exe.[/c][space=5][c]It should take less than a minute. ;)[/c]

[space=10][c][size=18][b]Welcome to the new Great Snooper![/b][/size][/c][space=5][c]This is the news window. This window will open automatically when there is something important![/c][space=10][c]If you have problems or suggestions[br]don't be afraid to share at the[/c][space=10][c][size=16][url=http://www.tus-wa.com/forums/files/great-snooper-3rd-chapter-25137/][color=White]Great Snooper Topic[/color][/url][/size][/c][space=20][r]ToOMiToO[/r]
